channel.title: Chinese on Anything is |Data| is Anything
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese on Anything is |Data| is Anything

item.title: ctextclassics, my First Package
item.description: My latest update is a big one - a milestone! I have authored my first ever R package, and it is available on my Github! It is an API caller for ctext.org, a site that hosts numerous pre-modern Chinese texts. The scope is broad, but think philosophical works in Confucianism, Daoism, Legalism, military doctrines, history compilations, works in medicine, and many more. I’ve indexed at least 130 individual works and I’ll keep an eye out for more.
